type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
First strike, vigilance; Exalted
[i]Twin Falchions[/i] – Each attacking creature you control counts as attacking alone and attacking with exactly one other creature.
[i]Fathers Sword Skill's[/i] – Whenever Chrom & Lucina deal combat damage to a player, put a lifelink or trample counter on them.
[i]Premonition[/i] – Whenever an opponent casts their second spell each turn, draw a card.
